page.title: 03EDUCATION(page 1)
page.content: {The Hawthorns}is a private prep. school situated in an area of mixed woodland. The cost of a term(10/13 weeks)for a full boarder is about Â£1000, a weekly boarder Â£900, day boy Â£600.Pupils range from 4 to 13 and at the age of 13 move to public schools .There are 175 pupils in the school. The school owns 25 acres of woodland, playing fields and a small lake fed by a stream.Pendell Court, a Jacobean building, was built in 1624,formerly a home for nuns.The school was first in Redhill.There are three hard tennis courts and a gym used for daily assembly.There are many out buildings, science lab., art room, sports pavilion.There is a small swimming pool.One man maintains fields and buildings.In the senior school there are 9 full-time teaching staff and two matrons care for boarders.
